scripts.dev: nodemon --watch docs --watch input.css --watch md-to-pdf.config.js -e md,css,js --exec 'npm run build'
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run clean:pdf && npx md-to-pdf --config-file md-to-pdf.config.js docs/*.md
scripts.debug: npm run build:css && npx md-to-pdf --as-html --config-file md-to-pdf.config.js docs/*.md
